sense.name: business that produces goods in volume
sense.commentary: MANUFACTURER[+business][+producer][+goods][+volume] Note: implies that production of goods is done in volume, large quantities
sense.examples: That clothing manufacturer has merged with a European conglomerate. Two thousand jobs were lost when the local manufacturer moved operations overseas. This company with two other chip manufacturers are jointly building a new fabrication plant.

sense.name: individual owner, manager or employer of a goods-producing business
sense.examples: Two manufacturers and three attorneys sat on the left side of the boardroom table. John's father was a successful auto manufacturer. Terrorists are suspected in the recent shooting of a prominent manufacturer.
